content.headline: Meet Pedro Ribeiro
content.description: 15+ Years Experience Transforming New Jersey Homes

content.headline: From Passion to Profession
content.description: Pedro's journey in home improvement began over 15 years ago with a simple belief: every New Jersey family deserves a beautiful, functional home they can be proud of. What started as helping neighbors with small projects grew into a passion for transforming kitchens and bathrooms throughout Union County and beyond.
key_points: Developed expertise in kitchen and bathroom renovations
Committed to quality craftsmanship from day one

content.headline: Why He Founded Top Notch New Jersey
content.description: After years of working with various contractors, Pedro saw an opportunity to do things differently. He founded Top Notch New Jersey in 2018 with a mission to provide homeowners with a single, trusted point of contact for their entire renovation project - from initial design through final walkthrough.
key_points: Founded in 2018 with a clear mission

content.headline: His Approach to Quality Work
content.description: Pedro's approach is simple: treat every project like it's in his own home. This means using quality materials, maintaining clean work sites, communicating clearly throughout the process, and standing behind every installation with comprehensive warranties.
key_points: Treats every home like his own
Uses only quality materials and suppliers

sections.headline: Our Core Values
sections.subheadline: What drives everything we do at Top Notch New Jersey

values.title: Quality Craftsmanship
values.description: We use premium materials and proven techniques to ensure every installation meets the highest standards. Your renovation is an investment in your home's future, and we treat it that way.

values.title: Reliable Service
values.description: When we commit to a timeline and budget, we stick to it. Clear communication, punctual service, and dependable follow-through are the foundation of our customer relationships.

values.title: Customer Satisfaction
values.description: We're not satisfied until you're thrilled with your new space. From initial consultation through final walkthrough, your happiness is our primary measure of success.

content.headline: The Personal Touch That Makes the Difference
content.subheadline: Why homeowners choose Pedro for their most important projects

personal_approach.description: When you call Top Notch New Jersey, you're talking directly to Pedro. No middlemen, no confusion - just clear, honest communication about your project.
Pedro personally oversees every project from start to finish. He's on-site regularly, ensuring quality standards and addressing any concerns immediately.
As a Linden resident and local business owner, Pedro's reputation is built on satisfied neighbors. Your project success is his business success.
The relationship doesn't end at project completion. Pedro is available for future maintenance, questions, or additional projects as your home evolves.

content.description: No hidden costs, no surprise charges. Every estimate includes detailed line items so you know exactly what you're paying for and why.
While we work efficiently, we never rush quality. Every installation is done right the first time, even if it takes a little longer.
We treat your home with the same respect we'd want for our own. Clean work sites, protective coverings, and minimal disruption to your daily life.
Comprehensive warranties on all work, plus ongoing support. If something isn't right, we make it right - no questions asked.

right_column.caption: Pedro personally ensures every detail meets Top Notch standards

sections.headline: Proud Member of the New Jersey Community
sections.subheadline: Supporting local families and businesses throughout Union County and beyond

community_aspects.description: We work with local suppliers and subcontractors whenever possible, supporting the New Jersey economy and ensuring quick response times for our customers.
Over 80% of our business comes from referrals and repeat customers. When neighbors recommend neighbors, you know the work speaks for itself.
